author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Replace use of PseudoTrap by TruncTubs in order to minimize the number of supported shapes 

The PseudoTrap shape was used only in Muon Yoke definition.

@cvuosalo - as we have discussed

#### PR validation:

![Screen Shot 2019-07-29 at 18 06 20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1390682/62064462-2e34de80-b22d-11e9-9100-f83e1876d0d5.png)

title: DD: Replace PseudoTrap shape by TruncTubs
